briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether the calibration of temperature measurement is present.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified TEMP task register.

Requested task.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested task register.

briefdescription.para: Function for activating the specified TEMP task.

Task to be activated.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified TEMP event register.

Requested event.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested event register.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified TEMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the state of a specific event.

Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the result of temperature measurement.

simplesect.para: Returned value is in 2's complement format, 0.25 Â°C steps

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the calibration coefficient for the temperature measurement.

Calibration coefficient.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the calibration coefficient for the temperature measurement.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given TEMP task.

Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given TEMP task.

Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the publish configuration for a given TEMP event.
